scripts.build: npm run build-alt && npm run build-alt-runtime && npm run build-alt-browser && npm run build-alt-browser-with-addons
scripts.build-alt-browser: browserify src/alt.js -t [envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t babelify --outfile dist/alt-browser.js --standalone Alt
scripts.build-alt-browser-with-addons: browserify src/alt-with-addons.js -t [envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t babelify --outfile dist/alt-browser-with-addons.js --standalone Alt
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -u exports -R spec --compilers js:babel/register --require babel/external-helpers test
scripts.test: npm run build-alt-runtime && npm run tests-all
scripts.test-build: npm run build && npm run tests-all
scripts.tests-all: mocha -u exports -R spec --compilers js:babel/register --require babel/external-helpers test
